entry.title: v0.10.1: "eltoo: Ethereum Layer Too"
entry.summary: Lisa has sent an email announcing the release of c-lightning 0.10.1, which was named by @nalinbhardwaj. However, Prayank is confused about the subject of the email and asks whether it is related to Ethereum. He also wants to know what exactly the Ethereum layer is and how it is connected with this release.
